2023 National Tire Safety Week

JUNE 26- JULY 3, 2023 

Learn More

Scrap Tire Management

USTMA finds that recycling of end-of-life tires has stalled. The 2021 Scrap Tire Management Report emphasizes the urgent need for continued investment.

Read the Report

CMTT Samples for Researchers

USTMA and the Tire Industry Project support ongoing scientific study of the impact of tire and road wear particles (TRWP). To provide researchers with standardized, cost-conscious material to advance the study of TRWP, USTMA is producing cryogenically milled tire tread (CMTT) and making samples available to researchers.

Learn More
